categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The bombardment of Kriselist was a battle of the Galactic Civil War.
During the Galactic Civil War, the urban world of Kriselist openly defied the Galactic Empire. As a result, the planet was bombarded by the Imperial Fleet and fell into ruin.
The Empire moved on, deciding that what was left wasn't worth salvaging. However, Rebel supporters continued to inhabit the shattered cities of the world.
